body:
Update Bedops to 2.4.39 which includes multiple bug fixes.

**Changelog:**
- sort-bed: Patched --unique to report output identical to sort -u.
- unstarch: Patched --is-starch test option to read only up to, at most, 8kb to check for v2 or v1.

The full changelog can be found [here](https://bedops.readthedocs.io/en/latest/content/revision-history.html#v2-4-39).

**Test Plan:**
2.4.39 built successfully as part of the Autamus Build Workflow [here](https://github.com/autamus/registry/runs/2362973918).
title: Update Bedops to 2.4.39
